title: Pronto! A new breezy packaging typeface by Sudtipos
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013093413im_/http:/typophile.com/files/prontotpph_3484.jpg)

**[Pronto](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013093413/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000316)** is a breezy, calligraphic handwriting font that moves to a timeless beat. The catchy rhythm of its casually artful letterforms make it a choice font foir packaging, bistro signage, and menus. Alternative forms of nearly every letter are also provided.
author: Ale Paul
